resources.string: This app does absolutely not store your fingerprint data. The entire security process is managed by Samsung API.
You have to register at least one fingerprint in order to use FingerLock.
Takes effect after reopening this app. By locking system apps may cause problems and a limited user experience in everyday usage.
It allows to automatically unlock all applications if the device is connected to a trusted WiFi or BT connection.
Select trusted WiFi connections among the saved ones in order to activate the Secure Zone. WiFi must be enabled to get the list of connections.
Select trusted BT devices among the paired ones in order to activate the Secure Zone. BT must be enabled to get the list of devices.

Time in seconds after which the application is locked. The developed locking method relies on the time spent in switching from one Activity to another. For this reason the minimum (not guaranteed) value is 2s.
Takes effect after reboot or soft-reboot.
Prevent locked apps to show explicit notifications. The original notification is replaced with a generic \"New notification\".
Display the password button in the fingerprint reading dialog when using the widget or when clearing the app data. The password is the backup one saved during the fingerprint registration.
All apps will be unlocked and you will loose your preferences.
Close modified apps from recent list.
Fingerprint Service is not supported in this device.
If you like FingerLock you can buy the Donation Package from Google Play Store
Too many attempts are failed\nAuthentication denied in 30 seconds
Unfortunately FingerLock is not compatible with your device and it will not work. Your device vendor is not Samsung or the Samsung fingerprint sensor is missing.
FingerLock will not work if you do not update the Samsung Fingerprint library
FingerLock will not work because the Samsung Fingerprint library cannot be found
If you enjoy using FingerLock please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
